name: You get me.. Right??
description:
Imagine you are a street cat. You have a need or you desperately want something. How would you explain this to a human, who could provide that to you? Moreover, how would you know if a human is safe to communicate? 

As humans, we always imagined to have the ability to speak the language of animals, but have we ever imagined the opposite?

In this game, you become a stray cat who wants to communicate with humans on the streets. Each person has different reaction, patience and. personality. Some people. hates cats, some tend to ignore and some like to interact with. them.  Explore your possibilities. Pay attention to their abilities and find hints about the secret language of cats!

As you complete your goal or fail to communicate,  start over with and a new demand! Do not forget, humans are hard to identify, they can be loving or be dangerous! Nevertheless, it is worth to try every time!
